channel.title: Audio Tutor | Learning German | Deutsche Welle
channel.description: Learn basic German vocabulary and improve your pronunciation with our English-German Audio Tutor in 100 lessons.

image.title: Audio Tutor | Learning German | Deutsche Welle

channel.itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn basic German vocabulary and improve your pronunciation with our English-German Audio Tutor in 100 lessons.
channel.itunes:summary: Learn basic German vocabulary and improve your pronunciation with our English-German Audio Tutor in 100 lessons.

item.title: Lesson 100: Adverbs – Adverbien
item.description: Learn how to use "schon", "noch" and "nicht mehr" in sentences. Expand your vocabulary with the Audio Tutor. Here you can learn new words and improve your pronunciation.
item.itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, adverbs, Adverbien, schon, noch, nicht mehr

item.title: Lesson 99: Genitive – Genitiv
item.description: My father’s dog, the title of the book … Practice the genitive. Expand your vocabulary with the Audio Tutor. Here you can learn new words and improve your pronunciation.
item.itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, genitive, Genitiv

item.title: Lesson 98: Double connectors – Doppelte Konjunktionen
item.description: Learn conjections like "nicht nur … sondern auch" and "entweder … oder". Expand your vocabulary with the Audio Tutor. Here you can learn new words and improve your pronunciation.
item.itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, double connectors, Doppelte Konjunktionen

item.description: Learn how to use "obwohl" and "trotzdem" in sentences. Expand your vocabulary with the Audio Tutor. Here you can learn new words and improve your pronunciation.
item.itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, conjunctions, Konjunktionen, obwohl, trotzdem

item.title: Lesson 96: Conjunctions 3 – Konjunktionen 3
item.description: Practice sentences here using "sobald", "solange" and "soweit". Expand your vocabulary with the Audio Tutor. Here you can learn new words and improve your pronunciation.
item.itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, solange, sobald, soweit

item.title: Lesson 95: Conjunctions 2 – Konjunktionen 2

item.title: Lesson 93: Subordinate clauses: if – Nebensätze mit ob
item.description: Ich weiß nicht, ob … Ich frage mich, ob … Learn how to use subordinate clauses using "ob". Expand your vocabulary with the Audio Tutor. Here you can learn new words and improve your pronunciation.

item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, subordinate clauses, Nebensätze, if, ob

item.title: Lesson 92: Subordinate clauses: that 2 – Nebensätze mit dass 2

item.itunes:keywords: German course, language course, learning German, audio tutor, Deutsche Welle, subordinate clauses, Nebensätze, that, dass
